name: Untitled Prototype Golf Game
description:
Project Title: prototype-golf-game

I created an indie video game that combines mini-golf with games like Mario and Super Meat Boy. I'm looking for feedback to improve the gameplay.  Also, looking for title suggestions. Please leave any feedback in the comment section below!

Thank you for playing!

Controls

  • A & D keys : Control the ball while in the air, can either move left or right
  • Up arrow key : Ball jump
  • Left & Right arrow keys : Control how fast you roll the ball
  • C key : World Camera controls (can trigger it on or off)
  • Mouse left click and hold : Allows you to move the World Camera around
  • Mouse scroll wheel : Zoom in and out when using the World Camera
